p: The study showed that the application of EOs was effective in antibacterial‎‎‎‎‎ and antioxidative ‎ activities. It was generally observed in our results that ZEO and OEO exhibited the highest antioxidative ‎ activity and anti-bacterial‎‎‎‎‎ effect against tested organisms. Additional in vitro and in vivo studies would be needed to characterize the active principles and to evaluate the potential toxicity of the four EOs.
